channel.title: Need some coders help! ASAP! I have a bug on my server that needs to be fixed!
channel.description:
everytime I kill somone on my server, they pop up in the spot where they died. And on there computer it shows that they poped up in east varrock bank? And if they move towards me, it looks like they are nocliping and they go past the dummy house..... its wierd. also when I die, it logs me out?
I have been looking in the tut section for this but i cant find it?
Can any of you coders help? :o

item.title: Need some coders help! ASAP! I have a bug on my server that needs to be fixed!
item.dc:creator: @sitebanis sitebanis
item.description:
@sitebanis wrote:

kk and i think ive seen a tut on logging out when you die because when i started this server making stuff, i remember looking at it… thats why i keep looking for that tut lol.

Read full topic
item.source: Need some coders help! ASAP! I have a bug on my server that needs to be fixed!

item.title: Need some coders help! ASAP! I have a bug on my server that needs to be fixed!
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

it’s your server lol, it’s normal happens to me
just go to quests menu and click invisible armour
that’ll work
as of logging out after dieing, just get used to it:]
(if you’re randomly getting attacked by nothing, click invisble armour quest, basically “updates” your screen)

Read full topic
item.source: Need some coders help! ASAP! I have a bug on my server that needs to be fixed!
